text:
Kaare Reidar Norum (24 December 1932 – 22 November 2019) was a Norwegian educator and nutritionist. He was born in Oslo. He was hired as a docent at the University of Oslo in 1969. He became a professor in 1972. He was vice dean of the Faculty of Medicine from 1983 to 1985, dean from 1986 to 1988 and rector from 1999 to 2001.
He was a member of the Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters from 1986 until his death.
Norum became a member of in 1971 and has chaired the council several times. He worked with Ingrid Espelid Hovig.

annotations.surface_form: Norwegian Academy of Science and Letters
